name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cirus: Crypto Wallet | Web3 | Earn Crypto

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Cirus Browser Extension is a secure multi-chain crypto wallet that pays you for surfing the web!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every day, while you browse the web, your data is being collected and sold.

Cirus introduces a secure non-custodial multi-chain crypto wallet that puts you back in control of your digital assets and leverages the value of your data to enhance your crypto experience!
Here's what you can expect:

üìä Earn from Your Data: 
Data is the currency of the internet! Cirus enables you to leverage your data and earn rewards in the form of $CIRUS tokens. Your data becomes the key to unlocking new opportunities in the crypto space.

üîë Non-Custodial Control: 
With Cirus, you hold the keys to your crypto. Experience the peace of mind that comes with complete control over your assets. No third-party custodianship means your cryptocurrencies remain yours alone.

üîí Enhanced Security with Multi-Factor Authentication: 
Your assets are protected by advanced security measures including multi-factor authentication, ensuring that only you can access your wallet.

üíº Manage Your Crypto: 
Cirus provides a platform for you to manage your crypto assets with confidence. Send and receive various cryptocurrencies seamlessly from one convenient wallet.

üìà Boost Your Cirus Score: 
Increase your Cirus score by engaging with the wallet's features, unlocking access to new applications!

üñ•Ô∏è Turn Your Browsing into an Earning Tool: 
With Cirus, your desktop or laptop becomes a powerful tool for earning. Whether you're at home or on the go, you could be earning from your data!

Download now to take control and discover the world of crypto.

Have more questions? Learn more here:
